org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal

Class AbstractServiceFactory<T extends Service>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.AbstractServiceFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceFactory<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GoogleAccountsServiceFactory, OpenIdServiceFactory, SamlServiceFactory, WebApplicationServiceFactory

    public abstract class AbstractServiceFactory<T extends Service>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceFactory<T>
    The AbstractServiceFactory is the parent class providing convenience methods for creating service objects.
    Since:
    4.2
